title: Develop a Clinical Trial Protocol
description: A clinical scientist is leading the development of a new protocol for a Phase 1 study.

tasks.description: Create a new protocol document from a company template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a new protocol document with standard sections.

tasks.description: Draft the study design and methodology sections, including objectives, endpoints, and patient population.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes the core scientific sections of the protocol.

tasks.description: Collaborate with a biostatistician to develop the statistical analysis plan section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent incorporates the statistical plan provided by the statistician into the protocol.

tasks.description: Route the draft protocol for review and approval by the cross-functional team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent circulates the document for review, collects feedback, and finalizes the protocol.
